input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain in Solid Gold'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Franco'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Miami Cuban Link Chain in Solid Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor product shares the same Cuban link design and general chain type but differs in material (solid gold versus silver stainless steel) and possibly weight. The function and silhouette remain very similar, making it highly relevant.
Shares the same brand, material (silver), and Cuban link style as the reference product; differs mainly in size (5mm vs 8mm). Very close in design and construction, so highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link style and presumably similar purpose, but different brand and no material specified beyond 'Miami' which suggests likely gold or gold-tone. Still fairly relevant given design and type.

Same brand and similar chain style (Cuban link), but the material appears to be gold (not silver) and it is a set which might include other pieces or accessories, plus smaller gauge at 5mm. Moderately relevant.
While from the same brand, this is a Franco chain, which differs in link style and construction from a Cuban link. Also much thinner (3mm). Therefore, low relevancy based on construction and design.
Same brand, same Cuban link style, same silver material, just a different thickness (5mm vs 8mm). Very similar product, just smaller gauge, hence very relevant.
